label: item 1
description: rings will appear in the order listed here, starting from inside the circle. ie. first ring appearing here will be the innermost

label: item 3
description: Description will appear in the toolt tip on hover over the item. It's optional.

label: item 4
description:
You can use a limited set of html codes in your description

Eg. have bold texts or even links. Altough it's hard to click on the links in the tootlip at the moment as it disappears when you move you pointer. It's on the todo list to fix

label: item 11
description: There can be subSlices with same name under different slices
